content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [AVExternalDataSource] WITH
(
    LOCATION = 'https://avdevstorageact.blob.core.windows.net/avfilesystemnamesynapse/aventerprises'
)

CREATE VIEW AVUSERDATA AS
SELECT *
FROM 
  OPENROWSET( 
    BULK '/dim/userdata1.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'AVExternalDataSource', 
    FORMAT='PARQUET'
    )
     
    AS FactFinance
---https://avdevstorageact.blob.core.windows.net/avfilesystemnamesynapse/aventerprises/fact/dbo.employe.parquet
CREATE VIEW Employee AS
SELECT *
FROM 
  OPENROWSET( 
    BULK '/fact/dbo.employe.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'AVExternalDataSource', 
    FORMAT='PARQUET'
    )
     
    AS FactFinance

------------------------
CREATE VIEW Employee AS
SELECT *
FROM 
  OPENROWSET( 
    BULK 'https://avdevstorageact.blob.core.windows.net/avfilesystemnamesynapse/aventerprises/fact/dbo.employe.parquet',
    --DATA_SOURCE = 'AVExternalDataSource', 
    FORMAT='PARQUET'
    )
 AS FactFinance
